backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing artwork storage, user profiles, access control, and artwork creation with authorization checks and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of the Upload header button and listing affected frontend components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files, including components, hooks, utilities, and routing behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variable definitions for light and dark color palettes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, routing between gallery and upload views, profile setup gating, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Component displaying a login-required message and a button to navigate back to the gallery.
Artwork upload form with client-side validation, image optimization, and ExternalBlob upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation showing only the Gallery button after removal of the Upload button.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkCard.tsx: Clickable artwork card component showing a thumbnail, title, and formatted price using direct blob URLs.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkDetailDia: Displays artwork details in a dialog with image, title, price, description, and creation date.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a modal for entering and saving a user's name during profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, exposing identity and login lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for artworks and user profiles, including list, fetch, create, and save operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoute.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing between gallery and upload views.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/formatGBP.ts: Formats a bigint pence value into a GBP currency string.
frontend/src/utils/imageOptimize.ts: Loads, optionally resizes, and compresses images to meet size limits, returning optimized bytes and MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx: Renders the artwork gallery grid with loading and empty states, plus an optional upload shortcut card that navigates to the upload page.
frontend/src/views/UploadView.tsx: Displays a heading and embeds the AdminUploadForm for submitting new artwork.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature versions for the Z'art gallery app.
